Also, compositions that correspond to exactly st=
oichiometric 
combustion
often cause 'equilibrate' to fail to converge, sin=
ce the equilibrium
composition is a very sensitive function of equivalence =
ratio here. 
The
solution is to move away a very small amount from this com=
position.


=3D> My mixture corresponds to the stoichiometric...
